se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers

Class JpaOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers.JpaOperations

  • public final class JpaOperations
extends Object
    Utility methods to simplify JPA usage and increase its usability.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      static <T> void create(T entity, javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static <T> void create(@NotNull
                              T entity,
                              @NotNull
                              javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
                       throws PersistenceOperationException
        Persists the provided entity within a database to which the supplied EntityManager is connected.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to persist. Cannot be null.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be created.

      • update

        public static <T> T update(@NotNull
                           T entity,
                           @NotNull
                           javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
                    throws PersistenceOperationException
        Updates the provided entity by merging its state into an existing entity within a JPA-aware entity.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to update / merge. Cannot be null.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        The updated entity, to be used instead of the supplied argument entity.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be updated.

        Replaces the state of the provided NazgulEntity with the database current state.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to refresh.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if the entity could not be refreshed.

        Type Parameters:

      • validateInternalState

        public static <T extends se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.Validatable> T validateInternalState(T entity)
                                                                                            throws se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException
        Validates the internal state of the supplied entity, implying that the validateInternalState of the supplied NazgulEntity subclass should be invoked.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The NazgulEntity subtype.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to validate.
        Returns:
        The entity object supplied as argument.
        Throws:
        se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException - If the NazgulEntity failed validation.
